item.title: Fighting Back Against NAACP Defamation
item.description: The NAACP has decided that it’s worth time to call 20 million American patriots “racists” for advancing liberty and economic opportunity. At midnight, the St. Louis Tea Party Coalition sent a resolution condemning the NAACP’s bigotry and hatred to its Washington bureau. The Tea Party’s principles are simple and clear: * Smaller federal government** Lower taxes** Fiscal responsibility** National defense** Federalism Those are precisely the tools to lift all Americans out of poverty.
